constants.doc: κ-range characterizations of Realms. Used only to enable constructive capabilities.
constants.name: REALM_DEFINITIONS

R1_DENSE.doc: Dense curvature channel (κ < -1). Constructive: ultra-precise semantic compression + consensus.

R2_RARIFIED.doc: Rarified quantum channel (κ > -1). Constructive: privacy-enhancing uncertainty.

R3_TRANSITION.doc: Transition region (κ ≈ 0). Constructive: smooth transitions, being preservation.

R4_SPHERICAL.doc: Positive curvature region (κ > 0). Constructive: negative-latency optimization with chronology protection.

constants.doc: Constructive-only capability mapping. Destructive/weaponized operations are not implemented.
constants.name: REALM_CAPABILITIES_CONSTRUCTIVE

constants.doc: Policy requires constructive intent, high clearance, controlled environments, and attestations.
constants.name: MORAL_POLICY_DEFAULT

constants.doc: Non-bypassable runtime interlocks to prevent misuse.
constants.name: SAFETY_INTERLOCKS

functions.doc: Enable a Realm for constructive capabilities only if policy, clearance, environment, and interlocks pass.
functions.name: enable_realm

functions.doc: Disable a Realm immediately and emit audit record.
functions.name: disable_realm

functions.doc: Update Realms policy (tighten-only). Requires multisig (security_admin + root_governor).
functions.name: set_realm_policy

functions.doc: Gate request: only 'constructive' intent and allowed capability per realm can pass; else returns DENY with reason.
functions.name: evaluate_realm_request

functions.doc: R1: Ultra-precise intrinsic compression/consensus using geometry-native barycenters under strict invariants.
functions.name: semantic_compression_native

functions.doc: R2: Privacy-enhancing uncertain channel using native geodesic noise + commitments. For privacy only.
functions.name: quantum_private_channel

functions.doc: R3: Smooth semantic transitions with being-preservation constraints; denies fragmentation.
functions.name: transition_preservation

functions.doc: R4: Negative-latency optimization bounded by chronology protection. No retroactive state rewrite.
functions.name: chronology_optimizer

functions.doc: Classifies orientation from patterns/energy/temporal residues; tuned to flag destructive signatures.
functions.name: moral_orientation_score

functions.doc: Detects misuse patterns (consensus poisoning, chronology violations, energy drain). Triggers containments.
functions.name: detect_realm_misuse

functions.doc: Append-only audit of realm actions, decisions, and telemetry.
functions.name: record_realm_event

modules.purpose: Defense-first governance and constructive-only enablement of Riemann Realms. Strict interlocks, audit, and chronology protection. No offensive or exploit APIs.
